snippet: The police said two 16-year-old boys were killed when the car, driven by a girl sitting with an instructor, pulled into the path of a truck.
abstract: Two teenagers are killed when truck strikes their driver's ed car in Warwick, NY.
lead_paragraph: The police said two 16-year-old boys were killed when the car, driven by a girl sitting with an instructor, pulled into the path of a truck.

headline.main: 2 Die in Crash of Driver’s Ed Car in Southeastern New York
